effect.clanginghowl.cosmic_irradiation.d: Decreases max health by 15%% and attack damage by 10%%; higher levels decreases further.
effect.clanginghowl.sawing_up_health.des: Decreases max health by 5%%; higher levels decreases further.
effect.clanginghowl.overdrive.descriptio: Increases melee damage by 4 and movement speed by 40%%.
effect.clanginghowl.internal_heat.descri: Emits non-destructive explosion that gives effect, and sets fire, to other entities.
effect.clanginghowl.neurotoxin.descripti: Inflicts damage over time, when moving; higher levels do more damage per second.
effect.clanginghowl.beyond_flesh.descrip: Certain affected will transform into a techno-flesh creature after effect nearly finishes.
enchantment.clanginghowl.energy_efficien: For each level, reduces energy consumption by one.
enchantment.clanginghowl.ecological_ener: Passively charges when the holder is exposed to direct sunlight. When the holder is struck by lightning, charges 400 energy
Dig in a 3x3 area unless sneaking. Increases energy consumption.
enchantment.clanginghowl.overdrive.desc: Grants Overdrive effect when using item, increasing movement speed and damage. Increases energy consumption.
enchantment.clanginghowl.killer_charge.d: Cause an electrical surge after killing, damaging other entities and charges all advanced tools in inventory.
enchantment.clanginghowl.fuel_saving.des: For each level, reduces fuel consumption by one.
enchantment.clanginghowl.napalm_stream.d: For each level, increases flamethrower damage and fire duration. Increases fuel consumption.
enchantment.clanginghowl.chain_burn.desc: Gives entities Internal Heat that will cause them to emit a blast upon death that gives effect to other nearby entities.
enchantment.clanginghowl.fuel_burst.desc: Change the Flamethrower to only shoot a short burst that damages and pushes away entities. Increases fuel consumption.
info.clanginghowl.energy.empty: The tool does not have enough energy
info.clanginghowl.item.extraterrestrial: §8-Attacks inflict §5Cosmic Irradiation §8on the opponent and also deal increased damage to §4techno-flesh §8creatures.
info.clanginghowl.item.hammer: §8-Right-clicking on some industrial blocks will cause them to become damaged.
info.clanginghowl.item.wrench.0: §8-Right-clicking on some industrial blocks allows you to turn them §2on §8and §4off§8, as well as repair damaged versions of the blocks.
info.clanginghowl.item.wrench.1: §8-You can also right-click to repair damaged golems and robots.
info.clanginghowl.item.drill.0: §7Holding the right mouse button allows you to quickly mine stone and earth blocks.
info.clanginghowl.item.drill.1: §7Each second of use consumes energy. The tool can be charged using a Portable Charger or a Stationary Charging Station.
info.clanginghowl.item.chainsaw.0: §7Holding the right mouse button allows you to quickly mine wooden and plant blocks.
info.clanginghowl.item.chainsaw.1: §7Each second of use consumes energy. The tool can be charged using a Portable Charger or a Stationary Charging Station.
info.clanginghowl.item.chainsword.0: §7Critical hits reduce the opponent's maximum health by §45§4%§7, repeated critical hits increase the effect, up to a maximum of §425§4%.
info.clanginghowl.item.chainsword.2: §7Attacks consume energy. The tool can be charged using a Portable Charger or a Stationary Charging Station.
info.clanginghowl.item.flamethrower.0: §7Holding the right mouse button launches a stream of flame that burns everything in front of it. Enemies hit by the stream of flame take increased fire damage.
info.clanginghowl.item.flamethrower.1: §7Every second of use consumes fuel. The fuel cylinder can be replaced if you have a §eBlaze Fuel Cylinder §7in your inventory.
info.clanginghowl.item.charger.0: §7Passively transfers §eEnergy §7from the batteries in its storage to advanced tools in your inventory.
info.clanginghowl.block.former.0: §8Forms a small cold zone around itself while active.
info.clanginghowl.block.former.1: §8In an active state, §7Extraterrestrial Energy Crystals §8begin to gradually grow on it. The colder the biome, the larger the crystals can grow.
info.clanginghowl.block.former.2: §8The crystal former can be turned on and off by applying a redstone signal or using an Industrial Adjustable Wrench.
info.clanginghowl.block.charger: §7Gradually charges the §eEnergy §7reserve of advanced tools placed on it.
death.attack.clanginghowl.neurotoxin.pla: %1$s's nervous system shuts down while fighting %3$s
